AttributeList.Text: Function block is used to manage the jobs inside an equipment module.

SIEMENS AG / (c)Copyright 2024 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Title: LAF_SelectJob Comment/Function: Function block is used to manage the jobs inside an equipment module. Library/Family: Library of Automation Framework Author: Siemens Digital Industry Tested with: S7-PLCSIM Advanced 6.0 Engineering: TIA Portal V19 Restrictions: --- Requirements: --- ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Change log table: Version | Date | Expert in charge | Changes applied ---------|------------|------------------------|------------------------------ 01.01.00 | 21.06.2024 | SIMATIC Systems Support First released version 01.02.00 | 30.09.2024 | SIMATIC Systems Support Block information properties updated 01.02.02 | 10.10.2024 | SIMATIC Systems Support Locked Output behaviour changed

Function block is used to manage the jobs inside an equipment module. If the jobconditions are fullfilled the job will be started by writing the defined job number to the jobControl Interface which is connected to the sequencer. In manual mode the job that should be executed will be provided by the HMI interface and is therfore written to the jobControl interface.
Enable manual control of the jobs. Status stored in statModeManual and statModeAutomatic to be used in supervisions.
Check if Job is enabled and could be executed
Evaluate if the job should be executed (Automatic or Manual Mode).
The Instance of this job is currently active.
jobCompleted is true when this job has ended and no other job has started
Update the output of the SelectJob Instance. All Signals are related to the specific job.
Update the hmiInterface of the JobManagement. The Signals are related to all the jobs that are included within the equipment module.
